alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:46PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coconino County near Highway 89 and Tuba City through 330 PM MDT/230 PM MST/... At 245 PM MDT/145 PM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moenave to 13 miles southwest of Tuba City. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, up to half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuba City, Moenave, Moenkopi and Hopi. This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 322 and 339. Highway 160 between mile markers 312 and 337. U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 468 and 491. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
